I have removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease":

* "APD" (atrial paced duration) - This is a medical term that refers to the duration of the atrial pacing phase in cardiac rhythm management, but it is not a disease entity.
* "EADs" (excitatory autonomic dysfunction) - This is a term that refers to a condition characterized by abnormal excitation of the autonomic nervous system, but it is not a disease entity.
* "TDR" (transmural dispersion of repolarization) - This is a term that refers to a measure of the variability of the repolarization of the heart, but it is not a disease entity.
